Luxury space that you can afford

Holiday

Book your stay Perfect place to relax and enjoy your rest. Five stars luxury resort Experience a unique stay. Well trained manpower Dedicated meal courses. Fine dining restaurants Discover a medley of flavours. Large swimming pool Unwind and discover joy. About resorts

Relax at the luxury resorts around the entire world.

A design-led approach guides the team, implementing practices, products and services that are thoughtful and environmentally sound. Family of professionals that creates intelligent designs that help the face of hospitality.

About resort 1 800 222 000 Started in 1995 Our hotel has been present for over 20 years We make the best for all our customers The resort is built in and around an 18 acres Sustainable and meaningful ecosystem of hospitality Our hotel has been present for over 20 years We make the best for all our customers The resort is built in and around an 18 acres Sustainable and meaningful ecosystem of hospitality

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Fabulous experience

The best people to take care of our most valuable asset is you.

Make your stay memorable.

The place has a fusion of a classy traditional and sumptuous contemporary taste. The picturesque resort promises you and your family opulent leisure, eat-ertainment and rejuvenation.

We love crafto. The owners were married here and generations of their family have loved and still live here.

248

Our room

146

Trained staff

89%

Good feedbacks

Why choose resort

Five incredible reasons to stay with us

Exclusive ratings

Enjoy in resorts and awesome ratings. We are happy to offer our guests truly fabulous experience of relaxing, balanced, and memorable vacation. Herman Miller, ThemeZaa What a great experience! I have visited one of the resorts with my friends and we had a great time! Highly recommended. Matthew Taylor, ThemeZaa Check all 3,583 exclusive visitor reviews on

item.title: Hotel rooms
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Superior room Deluxe room Signature room Luxury suite room Luxury resort

Experience a unique stay.

Trained manpower

Dedicated meal courses.

Dining restaurants

Discover a medley of flavours.

Swimming pool

Unwind and discover joy.

Previous Next Phenomenal view

Superior room

Discover a private home in the orchard three bedrooms and baths with a private plunge pool and service and a three sided view from the king size bed.

$199 Per night Book your stay Read More Previous Next Phenomenal view

Deluxe room

Discover a private home in the orchard three bedrooms and baths with a private plunge pool and service and a three sided view from the king size bed. $249 Per night Book your stay Read More Previous Next Mountain view

Signature room

Discover a private home in the orchard three bedrooms and baths with a private plunge pool and service and a three sided view from the king size bed. $300 Per night Book your stay Read More Previous Next Garden view

Luxury suite room

Discover a private home in the orchard three bedrooms and baths with a private plunge pool and service and a three sided view from the king size bed. $350 Per night Book your stay Read More Luxurious living lifestyle
Crafto hotels tells potential customers what they can expect when they visit a beautiful and luxurious 5-star sleeping experience at a very affordable 1-star price.
15 million customers trusted resort.

item.title: Superior room
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Executive chef Leading security Welcome drink Swimming pool Transport facility

Superior room

Enjoy your most glorious moments

4.8

Review by Google Per night

$199

Book your stay Room overview

The superior rooms pay tribute to fashion and craftsmanship. The rooms are approximately with views of rue alger and jardin des uileries. The selection and pairing of materials has been carefully chosen to give you a cool experience.

Amenities and comforts

40 inch sony TV

Wireless internet

Bluetooth player

Use of smartphone

Luggage storage

Beautiful nature

Exclusive ratings

Enjoy in resorts and awesome facilities We are happy to offer our guests truly fabulous experience of relaxing, balanced, and memorable vacation. Herman Miller, ThemeZaa What a great experience! I have visited one of the resorts with my friends and we had a great time! Highly recommended. Matthew Taylor, ThemeZaa

item.title: Amenities
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
The right choice for everyone looking for classical elegance and modern comfort.

A design-led approach guides the team, implementing practices, products and services that are thoughtful and environmentally sound. Family of professionals creates intelligent designs.

Our hotel has been present for over 20 years We make the best for all our customers The resort is built in and around an 18 acres Sustainable and meaningful ecosystem of hospitality Our hotel has been present for over 20 years We make the best for all our customers

Awesome facilities

Inspired stays in the heart of nature
  • Spa massage
  • Fitness center
  • Swimming pool
  • Outdoor restaurant
  • Private beach
Resort - Spa massage

Rejuvenate your inner sense with spa massage.

Discover a private home in the orchard bedrooms and baths with a private plunge pool and service and a three-sided view from the king size bed.

We appreciate your trust greatly. Perfect place to relax and enjoy rest. Resort - Fitness centre

Expert-driven content to guide your fitness journey.

Discover a private home in the orchard bedrooms and baths with a private plunge pool and service and a three-sided view from the king size bed.

We appreciate your trust greatly. Perfect place to relax and enjoy rest. Resort - Swimming pool

Healthy activity that you can continue for a lifetime.

Discover a private home in the orchard bedrooms and baths with a private plunge pool and service and a three-sided view from the king size bed.

We appreciate your trust greatly. Perfect place to relax and enjoy rest. Resort - Outdoor restaurants

Renowned for fine dining mouth-watering food.

Discover a private home in the orchard bedrooms and baths with a private plunge pool and service and a three-sided view from the king size bed.

We appreciate your trust greatly. Perfect place to relax and enjoy rest. Resort - Private beach

Summer means happy times and good sunshine.

Discover a private home in the orchard bedrooms and baths with a private plunge pool and service and a three-sided view from the king size bed.

We appreciate your trust greatly. Perfect place to relax and enjoy rest.
We believe in caring for our guests as family members. All facilities are re-assured with voguish care in all attempts to make your days count with us.
  • Buffet breakfast
  • Indoor games
  • Electronic safe
  • Complimentary
  • Business centre
  • Wi-fi connectivity
  • Signature salon
  • Wellness centre
  • Foreign exchange
  • Concierge desk
  • Valet parking
  • Doctor on call

item.title: Bistro cafe
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Life around great food

Bistros are known for their focus on high-quality, flavorful dishes that showcase local and seasonal ingredients.

Signature menus

Chicken breast burger $95.00 Mint parsley with apple cider vinegar, salt, spices. Chef special Medium cut spicy chips $80.00 Marinated tomatoes, fragrant curry, tamarillo. Baked potato pizza $80.00 Hollandaise sauce, green beans and potato galette. Chicken breast burger $80.00 Hollandaise sauce, potato and green beans.

Premium menus

Chicken breast burger $95.00 Mint parsley with apple cider vinegar, salt, spices. Chef special Medium cut spicy chips $80.00 Marinated tomatoes, fragrant curry, tamarillo. Baked potato pizza $80.00 Hollandaise sauce, green beans and potato galette. Chicken breast burger $80.00 Hollandaise sauce, potato and green beans.

Significant services

Our hotel has been present for over 20 years

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
In the day area 401 Broadway, 24th floor,
Orchard view, London Send a message info@yourdomain.com hr@yourdomain.com Booking on call Phone: 1-800-222-000 Fax: 1-800-222-002 Make your stay memorable

Have an inquiry or some feedback for us?

    We will never collect information about you without your explicit consent.

    4.9 out of 5 reviews (8549 Reviews) Join the 10000+ Travelers trusting with us Lorem ipsum dolor amet tempor incididunt labore dolore nostrud. Herman miller, ThemeZaa Lorem ipsum dolor amet tempor incididunt labore dolore nostrud. Matthew taylor, ThemeZaa traveler trusting
    Connect with social media
    • Facebook-f
    • Dribbble
    • X-twitter
    • Instagram
    • Linkedin-in
    Have any questions about booking? +1 800 222 000
